name: Gastrobots (itch)
description:
Gastrobots are deployed in the human body to track and eliminate threats. The main threat is cancer. Find the way to the cancer and cure it. 

Playing with a controller is highly recommended. 

ControlsControllerKeyboardNavigate MenuD-padZ, Q, S & D Control GreenLeft Analog StickQ & DControl BlueRight Analog StickArrow KeysShootLeft BumperEJumpLeft TriggerZGrabRight TriggerRight ShiftReset LevelSelectRMain MenuStartEscapeSelectAEnterBackBBackspace
